questions.description:
Assertion (A):In test-tube baby programme, ova from wife/donor (female) and sperms from the husband/donor (male) are collected and induced to form zygote under simulated conditions in laboratory. 
Reason (R):Embryos with more than 8 blastomeres are then transferred to fallopian tube (ZIFT) to complete its further development.

options.description: Both A and R are true and R is the correct explanation of A
Both A and R are true but R is not correct explanation of A
A is true but R is false
